tool_description: Use this API to fetch over 58000 records of registered airports, airfields and heliports in the world.
name: Aviation Airports and Heliports API
title: Aviation Airports and Heliports API

api_list.name: Search airport
api_list.description: This endpoint which is paginated also could be used to search a particular record by airport keyword or location keyword. This could be applicable when creating auto-completes etc.

api_list.name: Get All Airports
api_list.description: This endpoint which is paginated gets all airports, airfields, heliports etc.
